ali minis gatumata wiwidha wisandum gena aawath me dakwa ema kriyamarga sarthaka prathipala ath karagena naha.wana ali gahanayada shighrayen wandawime tharjanayata muhuna di thibenne ehi prathipalayak lesayi.ali minis gatumata deshiya sampath upayogi karaganimin sarthaka wisandumak soya dennata merata nirmanakaruwan pirisak samath wi thibenawa.merata bhauthika ha manawa sampatha yoda ganimin nawa nirmanaya eli dakwa thibenne shri lanka nawa nirmanakaruwange sangamayayi.ee wana aliyeku gammanayakata aasannaye kilo mitar 5k pamana durin sitiyadi gamwasiyanta ee bawa dana ganimata hakiwana lesa sakas karana lada nawaaarakshaka kolarayak nirmanaya karamin.adala kolaraya palanda athi wana aliya gammanaya aasannayata paminimedi gamwasiyanta ee bawa es.em.es. paniwudayak haraha labadima memagin sidukerenawa.nirmanaya athhada balime awasthawa horowpathana ali anathagarayedi eeye sidu keruna.ema awasthawata wanajiwi amathya es.em. chandrasena mahatha pamini athara nawa nipayumkaruwan wisin nirmanaya kala aarakshaka kolarayak wana aliyekutapalandawimada ehidi sidu keruna.
eya mata kisiseth apahasu nowanu athi."

eeth samagama dankande upathissa swamindrayan wahanse saha weralugasthanne pemananda swamindrayan wahanse, suwaris ralahami mahathage wasgeya athahara mehi sthira padinchiya sadaha wadama kala seka. 1931 juli masa 30 wana dina mema aaramayehi egodawaththa raththanapitiya dayaka pinwathunge aaradhanaya paridi prathama was wisima ema swamindrayan wahansela denama wisin sidu karanu labiya. 1936 mayi 22 dina dahawal 1.04ta yedenu subha mohothin mema aawasageya manaram lesa sadima sadaha mul aththiwaram pas pidalla kappawana lada athara ema wasarema juni masa boralasgamuwe paramadhammaniwesa pariwenadhipathi pujya lenadora dhammarakkhitha mahimipanan wahansege surathin aarama godanagilla sadaha mul gal thabimak aprasiddhawa sidu wiya.
